channel.title: VMware - need help Access is denied error when doing things
channel.description: when i open a .exe or open it through command prompt it says access is denied and i get other errors like you dont have permission to open this file and things like that.. how do i stop that? i have all of the permissions i just dont know why it wont let me open files i move over from my computer to my virtual machine
